thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 29 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: ‍Indivior Says Enters Into License Agreement For C4x Discovery's OX1 Antagonist Program​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: ‍Indivior Says Enters Into License Agreement For C4x Discovery's OX1 Antagonist Program​
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Indivior Plc:
* ‍INDIVIOR ENTERS INTO AN EXCLUSIVE GLOBAL LICENSE AGREEMENT FOR C4X DISCOVERY’S OREXIN-1 (OX1) ANTAGONIST PROGRAM​
* ‍INDIVIOR UK LIMITED AND C4X DISCOVERY HOLDINGS PLC ENTERED INTO A LICENSE AGREEMENT​
* INDIVIOR - ‍UNDER AGREEMENT, INDIVIOR UK OBTAINED EXCLUSIVE GLOBAL RIGHTS TO DEVELOP AND COMMERCIALIZE C4X’S ORAL OREXIN-1 RECEPTOR ANTAGONIST PROGRAM​
* INDIVIOR - ‍INDIVIOR UK WILL MAKE AN UPFRONT PAYMENT TO C4X OF $10 MILLION WITH POTENTIAL MILESTONE PAYMENTS TO C4X THAT COULD TOTAL $284 MILLION OVER TIME​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
